title: Essence
body: Hi, i recently bought 10 dollars of rp and bought the 975 costing bundle of 5 crates 5 keys and some orange essence, when i bought it, i recieved no extra essence, am i missing something or is this a bug?

replies.body: I looked into this for you and do see you unlocked the 5 hextech chest bundle.  I see that you obtained 5 keys, 5 chests, and 50 orange essences.  Let me know if that clears things up!
